effect: May cause the target to flinch when the user hits with a move that makes contact.
synergies: Moves with high flinch chance (e.g., Bite, Iron Head)
Pokémon with high Speed to exploit flinches
Held items like King's Rock to stack flinch chance
notes: Low activation chance (around 10%). Mostly outclassed by other abilities, but can be situationally useful in early-game or casual play.
